assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Atypical_Hemolytic_Uremic_Syndrome_Initial_First_Presentation_of_Recurrent_Q17
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: a) Unexplained thrombocytopenia (platelet <150 x 109/L or a significant reduction from baseline) AND the presence of hemolysis (schistocytes AND either increased LDH or low haptoglobin)
